name: Broad City
overview: Broad City follows two women throughout their daily lives in New York City, making the smallest and mundane events hysterical and disturbing to watch all at the same time.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The Broad City gals are growing up, and Season 5 packs an unexpectedly emotional punch. Yas, bitch. The queenz are back — at least for one final season. Abbi is still working at Anthropologie, but she’s been promoted to the sales floor.

episodes.name: What a Wonderful World
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana resort to desperate and unusual measures to scrape together enough cash for a Lil Wayne concert.

episodes.name: Pu$$y Weed
episodes.overview: Abbi decides to stop bumming off of Ilana and buy her own weed, and Ilana tries to be an adult by doing her own taxes.

episodes.name: Working Girls
episodes.overview: Abbi goes to the ends of the Earth to get a package for her hot neighbor, and Ilana juggles two jobs – terribly.

episodes.name: The Lockout
episodes.overview: With Abbi's big gallery debut just hours away, the girls find themselves locked out of both of their apartments with nowhere to get ready.

episodes.name: Fattest Asses
episodes.overview: Determined to escape their day-to-day routines, Abbi and Ilana attend a party and end up going home with a pair of questionable DJ roommates.

episodes.name: Stolen Phone
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana travel to all of their least favorite parts of New York City in search of Abbi's stolen phone, and Ilana hooks up with a guy who's in a terrible improv group.

episodes.name: Hurricane Wanda
episodes.overview: With Hurricane Wanda raging outside their window, the girls are forced to weather the storm with Bevers and his equally inappropriate sister.

episodes.name: Destination: Wedding
episodes.overview: Abbi, Ilana, Lincoln and two of their old friends resort to a variety of increasingly desperate methods of transportation in their attempt to get to a wedding in Connecticut.

episodes.name: Apartment Hunters
episodes.overview: Abbi looks for a new place to live after walking in on Bevers masturbating, and Ilana tries to confront a cable company that has been inexplicably charging her for months.

episodes.name: The Last Supper
episodes.overview: The girls go to a fancy restaurant for Abbi's 26th birthday, but the evening quickly sours after Abbi pees out a condom and Ilana reveals that she has a shellfish allergy.

episodes.name: In Heat
episodes.overview: Abbi hunts for a desperately needed air conditioner while Ilana tries to find the perfect birthday present for Lincoln.

episodes.name: Mochalatta Chills
episodes.overview: Abbi finally gets the opportunity to train someone at Soulstice, and Ilana hires a group of interns to make a sale for her at Deals Deals Deals.

episodes.name: Wisdom Teeth
episodes.overview: When Abbi gets her wisdom teeth out, Ilana takes it upon herself to take care of her friend while she recovers.

episodes.name: Knockoffs
episodes.overview: Ilana's family comes to town to sit shiva for her grandmother, and Abbi finally strikes up a romance with Jeremy.

episodes.name: Hashtag FOMO
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana go in search of the perfect party.

episodes.name: The Matrix
episodes.overview: Disaster strikes when Abbi and Ilana decide to go phoneless on the same day they're meant to attend a dog wedding.

episodes.name: Citizen Ship
episodes.overview: The gang boards a party boat to celebrate Jaime's impending naturalization, Bevers prepares to propose to Melody, and Ilana reconsiders her relationship with Lincoln.

episodes.name: Kirk Steele
episodes.overview: Abbi tries to extort Trey after she discovers one of his secrets, but the plan quickly goes awry.

episodes.name: Coat Check
episodes.overview: After working coat check for a charity event, Abbi goes on a mission to get Kelly Ripa's coat back to her and Ilana develops a sexual relationship with her doppelganger.

episodes.name: St. Mark's
episodes.overview: The girls head to St. Marks Place to celebrate Ilana's birthday in style, but their plans are derailed by a series of small crises.

episodes.name: Two Chainz
episodes.overview: Abbi tries to find a way to remove a security tag from her new shirt before her friend's big gallery show, and Ilana loses the key to her bike lock.

episodes.name: Co-Op
episodes.overview: Abbi impersonates Ilana to cover her shift at a strict food co-op, and Lincoln drives Ilana to a doctor's appointment on Long Island.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: Abbi's competitive nature comes out at the Soulstice Games, and Ilana takes on a new role at Deals Deals Deals when an important investor visits the office.

episodes.name: Rat Pack
episodes.overview: Ilana tries to distract partygoers from the rat infestation in her apartment, and Abbi learns how to use Tinder.
Abbi embarks on a quest to take the perfect driver's license photo, and Ilana's job hunt leads her to a surprising place.

episodes.name: Philadelphia
episodes.overview: During a visit to Abbi's childhood home, the girls set out to right a wrong from her past.

episodes.name: B&B-NYC
episodes.overview: The girls have a whirlwind night on the town after subletting both of their apartments to tourists.

episodes.name: Burning Bridges
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana both reach critical points in their romantic relationships at the same time Ilana's parents come to town for their anniversary.

episodes.name: Getting There (1)
episodes.overview: The girls experience a bevvy of obstacles on their way to the airport for a very important trip.

episodes.name: Jews on a Plane (2)
episodes.overview: The girls are forced to improvise when Abbi gets her period on a plane and doesn't have access to a tampon.

episodes.name: Sliding Doors
episodes.overview: In a flashback, Abbi and Ilana cross paths for the first time and spend the day together – or don't.

episodes.name: Twaining Day
episodes.overview: Ilana lands a new job at a trendy sushi restaurant, and Abbi finally gets the chance to train Shania Twain.

episodes.name: Just the Tips
episodes.overview: Abbi throws herself fully into a new relationship, and Ilana basks in her newfound riches.

episodes.name: Mushrooms
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana's chill shrooms day is threatened when Abbi's boss sends her on an errand.

episodes.name: Abbi's Mom
episodes.overview: Abbi agrees to take her mom out for a wild night on the town, and Ilana's seasonal depression takes a toll on her work life.

episodes.name: Witches
episodes.overview: Abbi freaks out about aging after discovering a gray hair, and Ilana tries to recapture her sexual spark.

episodes.name: Florida
episodes.overview: A trip to the Sunshine State makes the girls reconsider their lives in New York City.

episodes.name: House-Sitting
episodes.overview: Ilana frets about her relationship with Lincoln while house-sitting for the Strands, and Abbi considers going on a date with her former teacher.

episodes.name: Bedbugs
episodes.overview: Ilana and Jaime discover that their apartment is infested with bedbugs, and a cash-strapped Abbi gets a confidence boost from her new purse.

episodes.name: Friendiversary
episodes.overview: Ilana sends Abbi on an epic friendiversary scavenger hunt, and the girls risk everything to bring an apparent murderer to justice.

episodes.name: Stories
episodes.overview: To celebrate Abbi’s 30th birthday, Abbi and Ilana travel from the top of Manhattan to the bottom, running into old and new friends along the way.

episodes.name: SheWork and S... Bucket
episodes.overview: Ilana embarks upon her latest moneymaking opportunity when she opens an outdoor workspace for New York City smokers; Abbi stands up to her landlord after he refuses to update her plumbing.

episodes.name: Bitcoin & the Missing Girl
episodes.overview: Ilana visits an old flame to cash out her share of Bitcoin; Abbi drops off her laundry for the first time and loses her favorite sweatshirt.

episodes.name: Make the Space
episodes.overview: Ilana discovers a terrifying secret about Jaimé; Abbi tries to make the jump from sweater-folder to window artist at Anthropologie.

episodes.name: Artsy Fartsy
episodes.overview: Abbi gets invited to a fancy art event at MoMa; Ilana and Lincoln have their one year relationship check-in.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: The girls meet Ilana’s 16th cousin – who is a Holocaust survivor – and take him to a drag brunch; Abbi tries out a new look.

episodes.name: Shenanigans
episodes.overview: Ilana gets recruited to be a hair model; Abbi’s new flame tells her that she’s not mature enough.

episodes.name: Sleep No More
episodes.overview: Abbi and Ilana visit "Sleep No More," and Abbi tries to find the right time to tell Ilana some life-changing news.

episodes.name: Along Came Molly
episodes.overview: Abbi, Ilana and Bevers sell Abbi’s New York City belongings; Abbi gets tickets to a Lil Wayne concert, and the girls take a “trip.”

episodes.name: Broad City
episodes.overview: The broads say goodbye.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The Broad City gals are growing up, and Season 5 packs an unexpectedly emotional punch. Yas, bitch. The queenz are back — at least for one final season. Abbi is still working at Anthropologie, but she’s been promoted to the sales floor.
